CSAT_Journey_KPI_Del_1.label: CSAT Journey KPI Delta
CSAT_Journey_KPI_Del_1.query: config = load "${App.Datasets.Journey_Survey_Question_Config_Metadata_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; config = filter config by {{cell(Journey_List_1.selection,0,"Journey").asEquality("Journey")}}; config = filter config by 'Context' == "Customer CSAT"; config = filter config by 'QuestionType' == "Rating"; q = load "${App.Datasets.SurveyQuestionResponsewithDetails_tp.FullyQualifiedName}"; q = filter q by {{cell(Journey_List_1.selection,0,"Journey").asEquality("JourneyConfig_Journey")}}; q = filter q by {{column(CSAT___Customer_Journ_1.selection, ["Stage"]).asEquality("JourneyConfig_Stage")}} && {{column(Responses_by_stage_1.selection, ["Stage"]).asEquality("JourneyConfig_Stage")}} && {{column(CSAT___Customer_Journ_4.selection, ["Stage"]).asEquality("JourneyConfig_Stage")}}; q = filter q by 'Question_QuestionType' == "Rating"; q = filter q by 'CreatedDate_sec_epoch' >= {{coalesce(cell(Date_Parser_1.result,0,"Compare Min"),0).asObject()}}/1000; q = filter q by 'CreatedDate_sec_epoch' <= {{coalesce(cell(Date_Parser_1.result,0,"Compare Max"),0).asObject()}}/1000; q = group q by ('Id', 'SurveyVersion_Survey_Id', 'SurveyVersionId', 'QuestionId', 'QuestionChoices_Name', 'JourneyConfig_Stage'); q = foreach q generate 'Id', 'SurveyVersion_Survey_Id', 'SurveyVersionId', 'QuestionId', 'QuestionChoices_Name' as 'QuestionChoices_Name', 'JourneyConfig_Stage', first('CreatedDate_sec_epoch') as 'CreatedDate_sec_epoch',  first('NumberValue') as 'NumberValue'; q = order q by ('SurveyVersion_Survey_Id' asc, 'SurveyVersionId' asc, 'QuestionId' asc, 'QuestionChoices_Name' asc); q = group q by ('Id', 'SurveyVersion_Survey_Id', 'SurveyVersionId', 'QuestionId', 'JourneyConfig_Stage'); q = foreach q generate 'Id' , 'SurveyVersion_Survey_Id', 'SurveyVersionId', 'QuestionId', 'JourneyConfig_Stage', string_to_number(last('QuestionChoices_Name')) as 'Max Rating', round(first('NumberValue')/string_to_number(last('QuestionChoices_Name')),4) as 'Rating%',  first('NumberValue') as 'NumberValue'; journey = group config by all left, q by all; journey = foreach journey generate round((sum(q.'Rating%') * first(config.'Scale'))/count(q),2) as 'CSAT', count(q) as 'Total Responses', {{coalesce(cell(CSAT___Customer_Journ_2.result, 0, "CSAT"),0).asObject()}} - round((coalesce(sum(q.'Rating%'),0) * coalesce(first(config.'Scale'),0))/count(q),2) as 'Delta', case when {{coalesce(cell(CSAT___Customer_Journ_2.result, 0, "CSAT"),0).asObject()}} > round((coalesce(sum(q.'Rating%'),0) * coalesce(first(config.'Scale'),0))/count(q),2) then "rgb(0, 103, 20)" else "#B50E03" end as 'Colour';
